Description: Painted pottery shabti with black wig including lappets, yellow body with traces of frontal vertical line of black hieroglyphs, red vertical line from elbow to toes on both sides, arms crossed in relief.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
